column4: dezinezean: i set up a linksys router for my parents a couple of days ago, the login & password for that was Admin & Admin (maybe admin & admin) hope that helps
nox-Hand: was the installation on a pre-existing partition, or did the Ubuntu installer repartition the drive?
We partitioned before. Layout has a FAT drive for DellUtilities, an NTFS for WIndows, 1gb swap and 7gb EXT3 for Ubuntu
